oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Slothard, Jerry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 297; II; 08/00/1853; Can't find--the deed was not finished--south side of Poplar and the south side of Napier's lot--possibly Ann Stothard's lot section 23 lot 15--check that.
